scripts.transpile: lerna exec --ignore '@multicycles/{front,developer}' -- babel --root-mode upward src --optional runtime --out-dir lib --ignore "__tests__"
scripts.watch: lerna exec --ignore '@multicycles/{front,developer}' --parallel -- babel -w src --optional runtime --out-dir lib --ignore "__tests__"
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run transpile
scripts.dev:developer: cd developer && HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=8081 npm run dev
